meanings.definition: A person who works on a ship, especially one who is responsible for maintenance and operation of the deck.
meanings.sent1: The deckhands helped secure the ropes during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The captain assigned the deckhands to clean the deck every morning.
meanings.sent3: The deckhands joked about having to scrub the deck in the pouring rain.
meanings.sent4: The deckhands were the unsung heroes of the ship, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The deckhands' hard work kept the ship safe and sound.
